title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 45 - Amusement Devices, Viewing Stands And Tents At Carnivals, Fairs And Amusement Parks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 45 - Amusement Devices, Viewing Stands And Tents At Carnivals, Fairs And Amusement Parks

State Regulations

Subpart 45-1 - General Provisions (§ 45-1.1 to 45-1.18)

Subpart 45-2 - Amusement Devices And Temporary Structures (§ 45-2.1 to 45-2.23)

Subpart 45-3 - Slides (§ 45-3.1 to 45-3.8)

Subpart 45-4 - Funhouses (§ 45-4.1 to 45-4.3)

Subpart 45-5 - Viewing Stands And Tents (§ 45-5.1 to 45-5.7)

Subpart 45-6 - Go-karts (§ 45-6.1 to 45-6.10)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 45

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§ 21[11], 27[2], 870-i

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
